Description:
============

Who is this woman in white and where did she come from? What is her secret? Find out in Victorian Mysteries: Woman in White, an upcoming hidden object adventure based on the mystery novel written by Wilkie Collins in 1860. Youâll travel back to the Victorian era as you explore mansions, search for clues, uncover new secrets, and discover the truth about the mysterious woman in white.

CPU: 1.2 GHz
RAM: 512 MB

Hard Drive: 307 MB

Install and play
